summary.span: Represents a runtime handle for a module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和方法为字段、 方法和当前模块中的类型提供的元数据标记到运行时句柄实现高效的解决方案。The , , and methods provide efficient resolution of metadata tokens to runtime handles for fields, methods, and types in the current module.

summary.span: Gets the metadata stream version.

span.span: Gets the metadata stream version.

value.span: 表示元数据流版本的 32 位整数。

span.span: A 32-bit integer representing the metadata stream version.

value.span: 高序位的两个字节表示主版本号，低序位的两个字节表示次版本号。

span.span: The high-order two bytes represent the major version number, and the low-order two bytes represent the minor version number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要解决的元数据令牌标识的字段的父级`TypeSpec`具有包含元素类型的签名`var`或`mvar`，使用方法重载，它允许您提供必要的上下文。To resolve a metadata token that identifies a field whose parent `TypeSpec` has a signature containing element type `var` or `mvar`, use the method overload, which allows you to supply the necessary context. > [!NOTE] > 有关元数据令牌的信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"。Information about metadata tokens can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: is not a valid token in the scope of the current module.

span.span: is not a valid token in the scope of the current module.

exception.span: -or- is not a token for a field in the scope of the current module.

span.span: -or- is not a token for a field in the scope of the current module.

exception.span: -or- identifies a field whose parent has a signature containing element type or .

span.span: -or- identifies a field whose parent has a signature containing element type or .

exception.span: The method is called on an empty field handle.

span.span: The method is called on an empty field handle.
